title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: What is the general solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the square root of y, end root, minus the square root of y, end root, times sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="y greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, C times e raised to the 2 x, plus 2 times cosine x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, open outer parenthesis, three halves, times, open inner parenthesis, x plus cosine x, plus C, close inner parenthesis, close outer parenthesis, raised to the two thirds power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, one fourth, times, open parenthesis, x plus cosine x, close parenthesis, squared, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, one fourth, times, open parenthesis, x plus cosine x, plus C, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, one fourth, times, open parenthesis, x plus cosine x, plus C, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
